intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) provides comprehensive information about the High-Resolution Layer (HRL) Croplands products within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS). It details the product characteristics, production methodologies, data access, and quality assessment procedures for the annual HRL Croplands dataset. The document serves as a primary reference for users seeking to understand and effectively utilise these geospatial products for environmental monitoring, agricultural analysis, and policy support.
